links.title: FogChain's RadJav Rapid Application Development Platform Integrates with Apple's iOS Operating System
links.description: VANCOUVER, BC and SAN CARLOS, CA / ACCESSWIRE / October 18, 2018 / FogChain Corp. (OTCQB: FOGCF; CSE: FOG; FWB: MUU3) ("FogChain" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that RadJav has completed the integration of the iOS operating system into its platform.

links.title: Macs With Apple-Made CPUs Could Debut in 2020
links.description: Famed Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggests that Apple's A-series processors could be coming to Macs sooner rather than later. In a note seen by 9to5Mac, he suggested that the first Macs with Apple's own processors instead of Intel's could come in 2020 or 2021.

links.description: Schrodinger's Market. The bouncing cat is either dead or alive at S&P 2,800 and we won't really know which is which until the weekend as the S&P failed to hold it yesterday and our 5% Rule™ demands 2 full days over the strong bounce line (2,800) before we can put our rally caps back on.
